mcq.statement: Convert the Indirect into Direct speech: Samra is going to ask the principal for permission to go on a study tour?

options.a: Samra is going to say to the principal, "Might we have your permission to go on a study tour?"
options.b: Samra is going to say to the principal, "Should we have your permission to go on a study tour?"
options.c: Samra is going to say to the principal, "May we have your permission to go on a study tour?"
options.d: Samra is going to say to the principal, "Would we have your permission to go on a study tour?"
